website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for youngsters who love soft, plushy animals, but keep in mind that the size may be smaller than you expect.
pros: With bright colors and a flowing mane, this plush toy is affordable and adorable
It's also ideal for collecting, since there are numerous varieties available
cons: Some parents complain that the pony is smaller than advertised – not quite 8" tall
Mane may come tangled out of the packaging, but is easy to correct with a comb

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Our girls have been on an unimpeded My Little Pony kick for the last few months and their dolls get carried everywhere. I've been happy with how well made these dolls are, after weeks of heavy play the tail and mane are intact. We'll be looking for more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Kid KyotoTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: the quality for the price was very nice. My boys and niece love them
customer_reviews.text: Got a couple for my brony boys and my niece. They are actually well sewn and very soft and of a decent size. The hair (main and tail) was a little crazy and course, so they had me brush it all out (I used a small bit of conditioner in water to untangle it) and braid it. Overall, the quality for the price was very nice. My boys and niece love them.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Check Cracker Barrel first
customer_reviews.text: I ordered all 6 of these for my 2 year old to play with and a second set to put back as a future investment. She carries these everywhere in a backpack and loves them. They're worth the money, but you might wanna check your local Cracker Barrel first, I found a few of these there at a better price. But if your kids like My Little Pony, then these are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Smoke

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars I like it and I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Measure by a man because from foot to ear they are 6- 6 1/4". If they are well played with then they are in fact 8" from foot to top of poofy hair hahaha. I'm not buying to collect a certain size, just buying because my 3 yr old has a MLP addiction. The hair is the same cheap hair Barbie has. Prepair for some to fall out and get tangled. I bet money that this is made in China and FBA to make a profit. Sooo what can you really expect? My rating system... 3 stars I like it and I'm happy, no returns. 4 I would buy it again. 5 Can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Defective sowing
customer_reviews.text: The one we received had defective sowing. The red hair was poking out from the head down to the tail. The tail hair was sowed up againsts the little baloons, overlapping and covering the top baloon. My daughter doesn't notice and would not like to be missing it if I were to ship it back for a return so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clean

customer_reviews.title: Pinkie Pie Ty Plushie
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cute Pinkie Pie plush for the price. I couldn't really find these locally, with MLP toys or Ty stuff. I took a chance ordering it, hoping the hair wouldn't be frizzy or matted, and the texture of the plush's fabric would be soft. When I received it I was surprised that it was as cute as it turned out to be. It was for my niece, who is quite, and not quite as picky as say, a 35 year old man who watches the show, but I was pleased. It's cuddly and cute, and for under $9, one of the cheaper Pinkie Pie plushes.
customer_reviews.author: Robozippy

customer_reviews.title: the color of the display picture shows a bright vivid pink color and the hair all fluffed up and nice..
customer_reviews.text: eh its ok ... the color of the display picture shows a bright vivid pink color and the hair all fluffed up and nice...what i got was a pale pink pony with matted pink doll hair...kind of a let down
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loves this pony. I was hoping for it to be a little bigger but that is just fine. It was a gift for being good in school since she is in kindergarten and started school for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bright

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter just loves these ponies. She now has all of her favorites. They come exactly as you see in the picture and are 4-5 inches tall. The shipping was fast and I had no issues with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P. Del Pozzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much looks exactly like the photo. The hair wasn't mangled or tangled which was so nice. I think the MLP beanie babies are adorable and well made. This one isn't lopsided or weird looking at all, and didn't have any strange angular protrusions that I've seen on other brands/types of MLP plushes. I kind of want to keep it for myself because it's so dang cute, but this was a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy pony
customer_reviews.text: Made well but caught her digging in my bedside drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Txluke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece came to visit me in NY for a week. From the moment we left the airport she was begging me to buy her a "pretty pink pony", which kind she never specified. Lol This one fit the bill perfectly! It was small enough to take with her everywhere, plush enough for her to sleep with. This came in handy since she caught a cold while visiting :( so her pony kept her plenty of company. Plus, it was Prime eligible so I was able to order the pony and matching sippy cup in time for her to enjoy it during her one week stay. Totally scored "Awesome Auntie" points with this little girl :)
customer_reviews.author: NessaRose

customer_reviews.title: she loved all three of them they are just the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three different my little pony my granddaughter, she loved all three of them they are just the right size for a four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not 8 inches
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in these My Little Pony 8 inch dolls. They are NOT 8 inches. I bought 4 of them and none measure 8 inches. 2 are 7 inches or a little under and 2 are 6.5 inches. They look a lot smaller than I expected but my 5 year old niece loves them and they are good quality. Just too small
customer_reviews.author: relaxedshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Pinkie Pie fan
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. My only dislike is the hair can become knotted easily if not brushed regularly.
customer_reviews.author: qberticus1

customer_reviews.title: ... a toddler and I think she is going to love it. it is maybe the size of your ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a toddler and I think she is going to love it. it is maybe the size of your hand maybe a little bigger and it has pretty hair and the hair was in a tie so that it didn't get Messy on the way to your house
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pinkie has many adventures with the princess and others who came on Christmas to my nan-baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little pony! BUT the hair came VERY messy I tried to brush it with a comb but it didn’t really help I still have the pony stuffed in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Abigayle

customer_reviews.title: Slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, received item as described. Good quality, bright colors, no material imperfections. Shipping was kind of slow though, took 9 days to receive them from the day I ordered (shipped to Michigan).
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: Cute little pony toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pinky pie pony and the purple twilight sprinkle for my daughter as a Christmas gift. She really loves these cute little ponies! Seeing her playing with them all throughout the day makes me a very satisfied customer. Thank you. :-)
customer_reviews.author: BenjaminM

customer_reviews.title: Nice little toy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality toy for the My Little Pony fan. For $6, you definitely get your money's worth in a toy. Its not really a con, but you should note that the color of the toy pictured isn't correct. What you'll actually receive is a lighter shade of pink. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: great quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Very cute, great quality, fair price :)
customer_reviews.author: MrsAverage

customer_reviews.title: Pinkie pie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pinkie pie, so we got this as a gift for her. I love the way it looks, and her hair, but it's a little smaller than I was expecting. She still likes it though, so I put this in the win column.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Working on getting the "Mane" 6. My daughter loves this toy. (yes, I purchased it as a toy - perhaps in time we will get duplicates that are only for collecting ;-) )
customer_reviews.author: Am Chand

customer_reviews.title: Great addt to a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of a graduation gift and they loved it. They have two different Ponies and this was the next one on their list. The pony is decent sized and pretty good quality. The only thing is the "glitter strands" in the hair look like the tassels off of children's bikes. Over all I would say it is pretty good especially for children
customer_reviews.author: KaylaPaige

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the product is great. I was a little worried the hair would be messed up from shipping but no need to worry. The pony's hair is held in place with rubberbands loosely holding it together. My daughter loves this and it was pretty cheap too. Very happy with my purchase and will be looking to buy all the other pony's.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

customer_reviews.title: Really cute... small
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tiny .. smaller than I was expecting, but maybe that's my fault. Daughter loves it though. she calls it her pinkie pie baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pony. Basically looks like the picture. We now have three from this set (Rainbow Dash, Twilight Sparkle, and of course, Pinkie Pie).
customer_reviews.author: HLGStrider

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came in wrapped plastic. Had to let it sit for a day to have the hair bounce back to normal. Good quality. Size of a cats head.
customer_reviews.author: Olya M

customer_reviews.title: Pinkie Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Very soft and well made... just what you would expect from TY. Packing and delivery was great!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Love

customer_reviews.title: Pinkie Pie is my mantra for feeling good
customer_reviews.text: Pinkie Pie, Pinkie Pie, Pinkie Pie, my mantra when I'm feeling down. But, my 19-month old granddaughter loves her Pinkie Pie. We both love it.
customer_reviews.author: angusmacscottie

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty cute! I will say its on the skinny ...
customer_reviews.text: this is pretty cute! I will say its on the skinny side, if that makes sense, in the picture it shows a normal proportion, when I got it it seemed alittle bit skinnier, but it is about 8in..so its true to its sizing!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This was bought for my Great Grand Daughters as a Birthday Present and she loved ...
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my Great Grand Daughters as a Birthday Present and she loved it. It came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharliebrown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ponies' stuffed toy!
customer_reviews.text: All the plush My Little Ponies in this set are adorable and well made. I bought my 3 1/2 year-old granddaughter three and she carried them everywhere. Will buy the other three soon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Manvell

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was great, the little pony was just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a 3 year old- need I say more? She was absolutely thrilled.. The packaging was great, the little pony was just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Not new, as listed.
customer_reviews.text: This item was not listed as being used. But it apparently had been previously loved. I doubt my 2 1/2-year-old granddaughter will care. But it would be better to stay upfront that it is a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Allan M Remund

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: seams were coming apart. had to fix this before giving to my baby girl
customer_reviews.author: 2005supermom

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend 2 years ago, she still has it!
customer_reviews.author: Hershey kisses

customer_reviews.title: NOT A TY
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a Beanie Baby Ty when ordering this. It is hard; not cushy at all. It is sweet looking though and the mane is similar to doll's hair. Nice little "extra" gift for My Little Pony fan and the colors are true to the picture shown.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality of item seems good, but it isn't really 8" tall, more like 6 1/2". I was a little disappointed in the size as I had opted to purchase this instead of the ones listed at 6" for the same price. I'm sure my daughter will still love them, but I think the description should be changed to reflect the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: As promised and my granddaughter now has the whole set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these. It took a wile to receive, but it came from thr TY store so the product is good
customer_reviews.author: Wpbeech

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute my lil pony. I bought it for my niece and she'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: pinkpony13

customer_reviews.title: Cute little thing
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, about 8inches tall, my 3 year old loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5y/o grand daughter loved it, bought it along with Pinkie Pie zip up hoodie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. My graddaughter LOVED this. Very well put together and the colors are very vibrant

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I anticipated and like most toys, my daughter has tossed it to the side.

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: I gave this little gem to my Granddaughter for her birthday. She was in Pinkie Pie heaven. It was a winner for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little plush My Little Pony
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this little plush My Little Pony, very soft and cuddly, highly recommend to others.

customer_reviews.title: Cute pony for collection :)
customer_reviews.text: Nice pony, the hair isn't as neat and curly as the photo shows but still very cute! My daughter loves them all!

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The one we received was slightly different than the one pictured. She had shiny pink tinsel-like strands of hair. not that it was a problem, in fact my daughter loves her! Typical, durable, nice quality TY product.
customer_reviews.author: ATLB

customer_reviews.title: Just right gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Really, really love this stuffie. I got our 5 yr old twins the whole set (all six of the ponies) for Christmas and they just love love love them and carry them everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: but it looked like a $6 Beanie baby
customer_reviews.text: This pony was much smaller than I expected. It plainly says "8 inches", but it looked like a $6 Beanie baby. I was disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Pinkie Pie My little Pony
customer_reviews.text: All little girls now are really loving My little Pony. However this one is not cuddly. Cheaply made. But the price was right. Just not an attractive toy.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it! The hair is as pictured and perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! The hair is as pictured and perfect size for her to take it everywhere she goes.

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Size is perfect for little hands. 3-year old can hold and carry anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: 6" dolls
customer_reviews.text: These are not 8", they're 6 1/4" from top to bottom. If you include the horn, they're still barely 7". Deceitful.
customer_reviews.author: Emelie O.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can't get enough of her Pinkie Pie pony. I love these because they are great for kids to sleep with and I don't have to worry about her rolling over on a hard plastic pony.
customer_reviews.author: YoungerFamilyFun

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my daughter for Christmas, It came in perfect condition and right on time! She plays with it every day and no signs of rips or tears yet, but we shall see.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Pinky pie looks amazing and is very sturdy. She's gotten washed and is still looking great!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I expected but the size is in the description so its on me.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. Can’t give it to her. It smells so bad. Like mildew. Not in “very good” condition.

customer_reviews.title: Great Plush
customer_reviews.text: Good size for a hand held plush. She sleeps with these every night. They are about the perfect size and quality is good.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The main and tail weren't as full as in the picture, but the body was solidly crafted.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Every home needs a 'PINKY PIE in the HOME'. My niece LOVES PINKY PIE!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Cute.

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Got it for a gift but changed my mind after receiving it.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, but their hair is cheap and wirey. Gets tangled really easily and hard to get out without tearing it out.

customer_reviews.title: Quite a Cutie...this Pinkie Pie:-)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 6 year old granddaughter that is going to be Pinkie Pie for Halloween this year. Well made, bright color and combable hair.

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for our Neighborhood Santa toy delivery day. Pony has a huge hole along back seem. Daughter will not let me return she is 3 and does not understand. We are going to try to sew it. Very disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Not the same pony as shown and it had a hole
customer_reviews.text: I just got it in the mail super excited but,when I opened the box it wasn't what I was expecting. The pony I got was completely different from the picture. Plus it had a hole and some of the stuffing was sticking out.

customer_reviews.title: great toy

customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter all six My Little Pony's and she LOVES playing with them. They look super cute and she has a lot of fun with them.

customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my granddaughter and she loves it! Super nice quality, wouldn't expect anything less from Ty! Very adorable and worth the purchase!

customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo can't understand why the design is only on one side. Good quality, fun size without being tiny.

customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not soft and fuzzy like I expected from a Ty toy.

customer_reviews.text: The Pinkie Pie arrived as pictured for my granddaughter on time before her birthday. She enjoys combing the ponytail and the small size.

product_meta.title: My Little Pony - Pinkie Pie 8"
product_meta.description: Officially licensed My Little Pony characters. Super soft cuddly material & adorable features. This beautiful pony is ready to share adventures and fun with you! Each pony has their own personality - choose your favorite pony or collect them all!
feature_bullets: Official product from Ty's wildly popular Beanie Babies Collection
Look for the familiar heart-shaped tag that means you've purchased an authentic Ty product
Handmade with the finest quality standards in the industry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars584 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
